room_title: Escape room "File X: Area 51 Incident" by Escape Room Westford in Boston
review: We had an amazing time, working together toward Escape, everyone had a hand in solving the challenges. The friendly staff's instructions were informative and clear. The clues were well thought out, fun, and cleverly executed.

room_title: Escape room "File X: Area 51 Incident" by Escape Room Westford in Boston
review: soo much fun!! i would definitely go back and do the other theme!!

room_title: Escape room "File X: Area 51 Incident" by Escape Room Westford in Boston
review: Many escape rooms don't do large groups well, but this Area 51-X Files themed game was perfect for both beginners and experts. We worked well together and requested two out of three available clues. Good combination of challenging and doable; nothing was too difficult. We finished in the Top Ten! We'll probably go back and try the other two games. The staff was very helpful too.
